ape rata sadachara sampanna uththarithara ratak kirimata kapawemu yayi mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma pawasayi.janadhipathithuma penwa dunne elambaunu ekama nidahas rataka palamuweni palamuwenida ee sandaha kapawimata mulu mahath samajayama adhishtana karagatha yuthu bawayi.shri lankawa sanwardhitha ratak bawata path kala hakke ewani kapawimakin pamanak bawa penwa dena janadhipathithuma ee sandaha sudanam bawa da awadharanaya kale ya.kuppiyawaththa shri jayashekhararama purana wiharaye pawathi uthsawayakadi janadhipathithuma me bawa sandahan kale ya.kuppiyawaththa shri jayashekhararama purana wiharasthanaye abhinawa ranwata, pradhana wahalkada, atawisi buddha mandiraya sahitha bodhi prakaraya wiwrutha kirima janadhipathithuma athin siduwiya.
